const DList * fx_get_blacklist (  ) 

get the fetion's all black's accounts info

this function will return a list which store all black's account info

Returns:
a dlist value if successfully, otherwise return NULL..
A template to get all blacks account info from the dlis struct 
 Fetion_Black *black = NULL;
        DList *tmp = (DList *)fx_get_blacklist();
        while(tmp) 
        {
                if(     black =(Fetion_Black *)tmp->data ) {
         // do something to access this account...
        }

                tmp = d_list_next(tmp);
        }

See also:
Fetion_Black DList

const Fetion_Account * fx_get_first_account (  ) 

get the first account of fetion's accounts list

this function will return the first account of account info list

Returns:
a No_NULL value if successfully, otherwise return NULL..
const Fetion_Account *account = fx_get_first_account(); while(account) { //do some things...

account = fx_get_next_account(account); }

See also:
Fetion_Account fx_get_next_account

const DList * fx_get_group (  ) 

get the fetion's group info

this function will return a list which store the group info

Returns:
a dlist value if successfully, otherwise return NULL..
A template to get all group info from the dlis struct 
 Fetion_Group *group = NULL;
        DList *tmp = (DList *)fx_get_group();

        while(tmp)
        {
        group = (Fetion_Group *) tmp->data;
                if(group) {
         // do something to access this group...        
                }
                tmp = d_list_next(tmp);
        }

See also:
Fetion_Group DList

const Fetion_Account * fx_get_next_account ( const Fetion_Account *  account  ) 

get the next account of the given account

this function will return a account that was next postion of given account

Returns:
a No_NULL value if successfully, otherwise return NULL..
const Fetion_Account *account = fx_get_first_account(); while(account) { //do some things...

account = fx_get_next_account(account); }

See also:
Fetion_Account fx_get_first_account

Returns:

return fetion uid 's online status.

Returns:

const DList * fx_get_qun (  ) 

get the fetion's qun info

this function will return a list which store the qun info

Returns:
a dlist value if successfully, otherwise return NULL..
A template to get all qun info from the dlis struct 
 Fetion_Qun *qun = NULL;
        DList *tmp = (DList *)fx_get_qun();

        while(tmp)
        {
        qun = (Fetion_Qun *) tmp->data;
                if(qun) {
         // do something to access this group...        
                }
                tmp = d_list_next(tmp);
        }

See also:
Fetion_Qun DList

int fx_is_authed_by_id ( long  id  ) 

judge this id is auth to you add it

Returns:
AUTH_OK if id is auth, AUTH_REFUS if the id auth refus, AUTH_WAIT is the id is not decide.

if id is not correct, it will return FALSE

Returns:
TRUE if account is in blacklist, FALSE if not in,

int fx_move_group_buddy ( const Fetion_Account *  account,
int  group_id,
EventListener  func,
void *  args 
)

modify the group which account was belonged.

Parameters:
account The account which you want to move.
group_id The group is id.
func The operate's callback function's address, and the operate result will pass to this function.
args The operate's callback function's args.
Returns:
0 if fail immediately, or can get the result from func.

int fx_move_group_buddy_by_id ( long  uid,
int  group_id,
EventListener  func,
void *  args 
)

modify the group which account was belonged.

Parameters:
uid The account's id which you want to move.
group_id The group is id.
func The operate's callback function's address, and the operate result will pass to this function.
args The operate's callback function's args.
Returns:
0 if fail immediately, or can get the result from func.
